meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Suffering</kanji> and <kanji>labor</kanji>. Sounds like the kind of thing these soft hands wouldn't want to deal with. These are <vocabulary>hardships</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>troubles</vocabulary>. Hopefully you don't have too much of this with kanji anymore!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
